metadata.title: CVE-2023-52675 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:powerpc/imc-pmu: Add a null pointer check in update_events_in_group()kasprintf() returns a pointer to dynamically allocated memory which can beNULL upon failure.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
